alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Hays (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 2:29AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Caldwell, east central Hays and south central Travis Counties through 315 AM CDT... At 229 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Uhland, or near Kyle, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kyle, Buda, Lockhart, Uhland, Mustang Ridge, Niederwald, Onion Creek, Manchaca, Hays, Creedmoor, Maxwell and Mendoza. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
